empty_text: You do not have any databases for this app version

unique.name: Assign Unique Name
unique.title: Assign a unique name to this database in different versions of the application.
unique.desc: This option ensures that developers working on different versions of the app utilizing this database server will each have a dedicated database in the database server minimizing conflicts in database schema changes.

managed.title: Allow Agnost to manage database schema.
managed.desc: Agnost can manage the database schema for you, meaning creating and updating tables, fields and indexes.

delete.title: Delete Database
delete.confirm: Confirm database delete by typing <confirmCode>{{confirmCode}}</confirmCode> below.
delete.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete this database?
delete.confirm_description: Deleting this database will remove all associated data and cannot be undone.

enabled.desc: Models with timestamps automatically set create and update timestamp fields so that you can track creation and last modification date of model objects.

delete.title: Delete Model
delete.description: Deleting this model will remove all associated data and cannot be undone.

delete_multi.code: Confirm selected models delete by typing <confirmCode>{{confirmCode}}</confirmCode> below.
delete_multi.title: Delete Selected Models
delete_multi.description: Deleting these models will remove all associated data and cannot be undone.

models.title: Models
models.no_models: You do not have any models in this database
models.no_data: You do not have any data for this model

fields.title: Fields
fields.no_fields: You do not have any fields for this model
fields.enum_placeholder: Enter enum values separated by new line

delete.title: Delete Field
delete.description: Deleting this field will remove all associated data and cannot be undone.

form.name: Field Name
form.unique_desc: The value of the field is different across model objects.
form.indexed_desc: The value of the field is indexed in database for faster.
form.required_desc: Field value existence checks are applied during object.
form.immutable_desc: The value of the field once set cannot be modified later.
form.searchable_desc: Enable text search of string content.
